page.title: 13Shopping in Yeovil.
page.content:
Shopping in Yeovil in 1985 is very boring,because in the town,there are too many shops of the same kind, for example there are lots of clothes shops, shoe shops and jewellers. A new shopping precinct,the Quedam,was opened in 1985,but it is not much used,perhaps because the shops there are again the same as the shops in the town.Most shoppers shop in the High Street,and not in the Quedam. Middle Street too,is usually packed full of people and sometimes vocalists come to play music or put on small plays.I like the shops that sell everything,for example,Denners in the High Street, and Dingles.
Christie Bommert,Aged 11.
